#summary Source downloads and SVN access.

= Source under development =

*We plan to release v0.1 of the code in February of 2009 when the last few major features are complete.* You can download our in-development code below.

Thanks for your interest in our project and feel free to [http://openipam.org/htm/contact contact us] with questions.

= SVN =

== This code is _very_ pre-alpha. It will likely eat your homework and then burst into flames. No support provided! ==

Use this command to anonymously check out the latest project source code:
{{{
# Non-members may check out a read-only working copy anonymously over HTTP.
svn checkout http://openipam.googlecode.com/svn/trunk/ openipam
}}}
